recipe.title: Sluggers' Strawberry Slushies
instructions: Purée strawberries, Riesling, lemon juice, and sugar in a food processor until liquefied. Process in an ice cream maker according to manufacturer's instructions. Divide among cups. Serve immediately with straws, or transfer to a container and freeze.
